text.author: Santa Barbara Corpus of Spoken American English (ed. John W. Du Bois)
text.title: Judgmental on People
text.summary: Kevin and two other friends discuss a recent emergency room visit for Jito, one of the friends' baby, as well as the dangerous effects of a high fever, some relatives they identify on a picture, and how baby Jito resembles his grandfather when he watches TV half asleep with a bottle in his hand.
